name: SFPL eLibrary
description: Free access to ebooks, audiobooks, magazines, newspapers, movies, music, learning courses, research databases, and more with SF library card
fullDescription: San Francisco Public Library's eLibrary provides free digital access to ebooks, audiobooks, databases, learning courses, and streaming content.
whatTheyOffer:
- Ebooks and audiobooks (Libby, OverDrive)
- Digital magazines and newspapers
- Streaming movies and music
- LinkedIn Learning courses
- Research databases
- Language learning (Mango Languages)
howToGetIt:
1. Get a San Francisco Public Library card (free for residents)
2. Visit sfpl.org/elibrary
3. Browse available digital resources
4. Sign in with your library card
5. Access content on computer or mobile devices
keywords: SFPL, San Francisco Public Library, eLibrary, ebooks, audiobooks, Libby, OverDrive, LinkedIn Learning, Mango Languages, databases
